name: Fatrifice 2
description:
The demoness Shar, summoned by a group of girls who performed a fatrifice, wants to become even stronger! And how will she do that, you ask? That’s a good question, by another fatrifice!



A sequel to the first Fatrifice game, but this time around, it’s Lilith’s turn. She’s not doing it alone though, Delilah will be cooking the food for Lilith! There is also a shop to buy skills and different foods for her to eat! Help her expand into new shapes and sizes by cooking and feeding her!

FEATURES

  • A cute girl who gains weight.
  • A feeding minigame and a cooking minigame.
  • A fun and lovable story.
  • A shop to buy skills and different food.
  • A gallery to revisit you favorite moments.
  • Achievements to feel good about.
  • An endless mode after completing the game.
  • A chubby chasing demoness.
